section.heading: Health benefit plan reimbursement.
section.text: All health insurer health benefit plans shall reimburse for newborn hearing screenings conducted under this subchapter.

annotations.annotation: Section 7(b) of D.C. Law 13-276 provided: “(b) Section 4 shall apply to all health benefit plans issued or reissued beginning on the first day of the month 120 days following the effective date of this act.”
